resources.string: Tap to change how long articles are kept
Tap to change how often articles are updated
Export subscriptions in OPML format to SD card
Download and display the linked article rather than the summary
Are you sure you want to delete this feed?
What would you like to call this subscription?

Hints
Find podcasts using your web browser, and click on the RSS link. This will bring up a list of actions, including FeedScribe. Choosing FeedScribe will automatically fill in the URL for you. 

 If you are having trouble finding content. Try some of these sites:
 www.videopodcasts.tv
 edition.cnn.com/services/podcasting

Welcome to the FeedScribe Beta 
This is the first version of what we hope will become one of the best newsreading and podcasting applications for android. 
 
Get started by clicking the menu button, and adding some feeds. 
 
Only a few features are implemented so far, but playing audio and video podcasts, as well as offline news reading are very usable. 
 
Please take time to leave your comments, either via the market, or the settings screen. With your feedback we hope to create an app that you will enjoy using. 
 
Some of the things we are planning include: 
* Playlists 
* Podcast directory searching 
* Scheduled downloading 
* Google Reader Integration 


New In 0.8.0 
* Display embedded ID3 images while playing podcasts 
* Display podcast feed logos in feed lists 
* Remember scroll position in news articles 
* Allow individual feeds to be manually refreshed 
 
New In 0.7.5 
* Fix crash bug when audio playback is stopped 
* Fix crash bug when parsing malformed XML 
 
New In 0.7.4 
* Allow feeds to be renamed 
 
New In 0.7.3 
* Allow podcasts to play in background 
* Add option to delete downloaded files 
* Fix deleting feeds and items 
 
New In 0.6.0 
* Add OPML import and export 
* Add auto-resume of failed downloads 
* Add external player option for media 
* Fix playing files with special characters 
* Fix play/pause button not changing 
* Reduce memory usage during background feed updates 
 
New In 0.5.0 
* Add dedicated audio player 
* Fix potential crash when there are no subscriptions 
 
New In 0.4.0 
* Add Offline full article support 
* Add Basic atom feed support 
* Add Per-feed article settings 
* Improve Textify article extraction 
* Add zoom controls to article view 
* Add progress bar when loading pages 
* Fix automatic marking of videos as old 
* Add basic favourites support 
 
New In 0.3.0 
* Text feed support with article text optimiser 
* Bookmarking from browser - select share or send in your browser 
* Fullscreen video toggle 
 
New In 0.2.0 
* Schedule updates on phone boot 
* Download while screen is off 
* Crash fix 
* Support for blip.tv
